name: Exoskeleton Mark II
title: Exoskeleton Mark II
author: axtox
description: Adds new equipment - Exoskeleton Mark II with enhanced properties (inventory slots +60, speed movement x2 (stackable), larger quickbar size (+1 line), log. slots +5 and trash slots +10, mining speed +30%). Just like in real life exoskeletons expands human capabilities to carry more and move faster.
